title: 5e House Rules
content:
In this pages we will discuss Houses Rules that we will be used in the table#Ability Scores Improvement#Pada aturan (Core Rules) Dungeon and Dragons 5e setiap 4 level character dapat memilih Ability Scores Improvement atau Feats. Pada campaign ini akan diganti untuk ASI (Ability Scores Improvement) +2 akan pasti player dapatkan pada setiap level berikut:
Levels Ability Scores Improvement 2 +2 Point (Bisa disebar) 6 +2 Point 10 +2 Point 14 +2 Point 18 +2 Point Feats#Untuk Feats, player mendapatkan feats setiap 4 level yang di dapat (Bukan level per Class). Berikut adalah tabel yang player character dapatkan:
Levels Feats 4 1 Feats 8 1 Feats 12 1 Feats 16 1 Feats 20 1 Feats Skills#Untuk Skills, player mendapatkan tambahan skills pada level 3 kemudian setiap 2 level sampai batas level. Berikut adalah penjelasannya:
Skill Progression Table#Level Skill Increases Effect 3 +1 Skill Gain proficiency in a new skill OR improve an existing skill. 5 +1 Skill Improve a skill to Expertise Level 1 (double proficiency bonus). 7 +1 Skill Gain proficiency in a new skill OR improve an existing skill. 9 +1 Skill Improve a skill to Expertise Level 2 (special effects unlocked). 11 +1 Skill Gain proficiency in a new skill OR improve an existing skill. 13 +1 Skill Improve a skill to Expertise Level 3 (powerful effects unlocked). 15 +1 Skill Gain proficiency in a new skill OR improve an existing skill. 17 +1 Skill Improve a skill to Expertise Level 4 (legendary effect). 19 +1 Skill Gain proficiency in a new skill OR improve an existing skill. Skill Improvement Explanation#Each skill can be improved multiple times to unlock new effects. You can choose to improve a skill instead of gaining a new one at certain levels.
Skill Progression Tiers:#Expertise Level 1: Double proficiency bonus. Expertise Level 2: Unlocks a minor special effect. Expertise Level 3: Unlocks a major combat or utility effect. Expertise Level 4: Unlocks a legendary effect. Skill Effects by Level#Skill Expertise Level 2 (Minor Effect) Expertise Level 3 (Major Effect) Expertise Level 4 (Legendary Effect) Acrobatics Can reduce fall damage by 20 feet. Can stand up from prone as a reaction. Can dash up walls and leap over enemies (monk-like movement). Animal Handling Advantage on calming animals. Can command beasts to assist in combat. Can tame legendary creatures (dragons, griffons, etc.). Arcana Identify spells without a check. Can detect magic at will. Can counterspell once per long rest for free. Athletics Can shove enemies 10 feet instead of 5. Can grapple huge creatures. Can leap incredible distances and ignore terrain. Deception Can impersonate voices perfectly. Can talk your way past most guards. Can convince someone of an absurd lie with a high roll. History Recall specific historical events automatically. Know ancient secrets about artifacts or lost cities. Can recall past lives or memories from before you were born. Insight Always know when someone is lying. Can sense invisible creatures if they are watching you. Can see through magical disguises. Intimidation Cause an enemy to hesitate (lower AC by 1 for 1 turn). Can frighten a weaker enemy into surrendering. Can cause NPCs or weak creatures to die from fear. Investigation Spot hidden doors/traps without rolling. Deduce the weaknesses of a creature mid-combat. Can instantly solve puzzles or find hidden truths. Medicine Can stabilize a dying creature without rolling. Can heal an ally for free outside combat. Can resurrect someone mid-combat. Nature Identify plant-based poisons at a glance. Can survive in any environment. Can communicate with nature itself. Perception Passive Perception increases by +5. Can spot invisible enemies if they make noise. Can sense movement through walls. Performance Can earn money and favors easily. Can influence NPCs in a city-wide area. Can change someone’s mood entirely through music/speech. Persuasion Advantage on all persuasion checks. Can convince people of a near-impossible request. Can sway entire armies or kingdoms. Religion Recognize religious symbols and rituals instantly. Can bless an area, granting minor buffs. Can banish undead/demons with a prayer. Sleight of Hand Can pickpocket without disadvantage. Can plant items on people unnoticed. Can steal magical items from someone mid-combat. Stealth Can hide even while being watched. Can move silently in armor. Can become almost invisible, even in plain sight. Survival Can track creatures with pinpoint accuracy. Immune to natural hazards like extreme cold/heat. Can predict natural disasters before they happen. How This Works in Play#Each level, you choose to either: Gain proficiency in a new skill (if you aren’t proficient already). Improve an existing skill, unlocking new abilities at levels 5, 9, 13, and 17. At level 3 and every two levels after, you get one skill increase. Rogues gain a skill increase every level, making them the undisputed skill masters. Critical Damage Dice#Untuk di meja kita akan menerapkan critical damage menggunakan rumus Chris Perkin. Jadi 1 akan Max Dice dan 1 Dice akan Roll
Contoh: Critical Greatsword (2x2d6) = DMG dice 12 + 2d6.
Armor Class#Untuk armor class akan berfungsi sepertinya pada core rules dari DnD 5e. Berikut adalah tambahan tipe Armor Class:
Touch Armor Class (AC)#Touch Armor Class (AC) adalah Armor Class tanpa menambahkan modifier dari armor yang digunakan oleh character tetapi menambahkan modifier dari Dexterity ataupun jika menggunakan Unarmored Defense dari monk maka akan menambahkan modifier dari Wisdom.
Cara menghitung Touch AC#Touch AC = 10 + Dexterity Modifier + Any Dodge/Deflection Bonuses + Size Modifier
🔹 Example Calculations
Character Normal AC Touch AC Notes Fighter in Full Plate (AC 18, Dex +0) 18 10 Heavy armor offers no protection. Dexterous Rogue (AC 15, Dex +4, Unarmored) 15 14 Still agile, but bullets are dangerous. Monk with Unarmored Defense (AC 17, Dex +3, Wis +2) 17 15 Monk still benefits from speed. Tiny Creature (Fairy, Dex +3, Size +2) 16 15 Small size makes them harder to hit. Cover Mechanic#Player dapat menggunakan cover yang tersedia pada map (battle) yang akan menambahkan Touch AC character yang dapat dilihat dari: $Cover Size$ vs $Character Size$. Berikut adalah attributenya:
Cover Size Touch AC Bonus Half-Cover (Setengah Badan) +2 Touch AC 3/4 Cover +5 Touch AC Total Cover Tidak bisa di-target Roll Success and Fails Criteria to Saves Throws#Pada campaign ini akan diberikan beberapa kriteria-kriteria yang akan berlaku pada hasil roll dari pemain. Berikut adalah kriterianya;
Criteria Formula Critical Success $Roll + Modifier ≥ DC + 10$ Success $Roll + Modifier ≥ DC$ Failure $Roll + Modifier < DC$ Critical Failure $Roll + Modifier ≤ DC - 10$ Contoh:
Fireball (Critical Success Saving Throw) : No Damage Fireball (Success Saving Throw) : Half Damage Fireball (Failure Saving Throw) : Full Damage Fireball (Critical Failure Saving Throw) : Double Damage Bonus Action#Pada saat combat player dapat melakukan gerakan berikut dengan memakan bonus action mereka. Berikut adalah list dari gerakannya:
Intimidate#Ketika combat player yang jaraknya tidak lebih dari 5ft dari target dapat melakukan Intimidate kepada musuh jika:
Roll + Intimidate Skills >= 10 + Wisdom Modifier
maka target akan mendapatkan $-1$ Penalty pada ACRoll target per 1 round.
Feint#Ketika combat player yang jaraknya tidak lebih dari 5ft dari target dapat melakukan Feint untuk mendapatkan advantage jika:
Roll + Deception >= 10 + Wisdom Modifier
maka player akan mendapatkan advantage pada target tersebut.
Consume Potion & Goodberry#Saat combat player dapat menggunakan potion dengan memakan bonus action character mereka.
Spells & Levels Tiers#Levels Tiers#Di dalam campaign ini akan ditunjukkan tier level yang memungkinkan membantu untuk saat saving throws, berikut adalah list nya :
Tiers Levels Monster CR Description Tier 1 1 - 4 CR 1/8 - CR 4 Local Heroes Tier 2 5 - 10 CR 5 - CR 10 Heroes of the Realms Tier 3 11 - 16 CR 11 - CR 16 Masters of the Realms Tier 4 17 - 20 CR 17+ Masters of the World Apa yang mempengaruhi level tiers ini ? Pengaruhnya adalah kepada saving throws kepada karakter, terutama boss jika memiliki tier diatas player. Berikut adalah deskripsi-nya:
Powerful enemies (higher tier than the caster) resist full-effect CC spells.
Example: A Tier 3 boss vs. a Tier 2 caster → Hold Person won’t fully work unless the boss fails by 5+. Weaker enemies still get affected normally. Partial effects replace Legendary Resistances:
Example: If a boss barely fails a saving throw against Polymorph, it might lose its turn instead of transforming. If they fail by 10+, the full effect applies. Berikut adalah spell scaling berdasarkan weakened atau enhanced effects:
Tier-Based Spell Scaling (Weakened Effects)#If the target is a higher tier than the caster, the spell effect is reduced based on its type:
Spell Type Weakened Effect Against Higher-Tier Creatures Save-or-Suck (Paralysis, Polymorph, Banishment, etc.) Partial effect instead of full (Hold Monster only stuns, Polymorph reduces speed & AC instead of transforming, etc.). Charm & Mind Control (Dominate, Suggestion, Fear, etc.) The target gets an extra save every round. If they fail by 10 or more, they get the normal effect. Damage Spells (Fireball, Disintegrate, etc.) The target resists half the damage if it saves by 5 or more. Debuffs (Bane, Slow, Bestow Curse, etc.) Effects are halved (e.g., Slow only reduces movement, Bestow Curse lasts fewer rounds). Summoning Spells (Conjure X, Planar Binding, etc.) Summoned creatures have fewer hit points (or weaker effects). Control Spells (Wall of Force, Telekinesis, etc.) The target can interact with or resist the spell more easily (e.g., a Tier 4 creature can break Wall of Force with an action). Healing & Buffs (Bless, Shield, etc.) No change unless a higher-tier creature is negating them (e.g., an anti-magic field). Tier-Based Spell Scaling (Enhanced Effects)#If the caster’s tier is higher than the target’s tier, the spell is empowered:
Spell Type Enhanced Effect Against Lower-Tier Creatures Save-or-Suck Spells If the target fails by 10 or more, they suffer double duration or lose their next action. Charm & Mind Control No extra saves. Damage Spells On a failed save by 10 or more, damage doubles (like a critical hit). Debuffs No immunity (e.g., normally Bestow Curse might not affect legendary creatures, but it now does). Summoning Spells Summoned creatures have bonus HP and attack rolls. Control Spells The spell’s range, duration, or area increases. Healing & Buffs Targets gain extra temp HP or resistances. Example Applications#A Level 8 Sorcerer (Tier 2) casting Hold Person on a CR 15 Lich (Tier 3) → Instead of full paralysis, the Lich loses its next bonus action on a failed save.
A Level 18 Cleric (Tier 4) casting Banishment on a CR 9 Giant (Tier 2) → If the Giant fails by 10 or more, it is banished permanently instead of just for 1 minute.
A Level 6 Bard (Tier 2) casting Fear on a CR 20 Balor (Tier 4) → The Balor gets advantage on its save, and on failure, it only loses its next reaction instead of running away.
A Level 16 Wizard (Tier 3) casting Fireball on a CR 6 Troll (Tier 2) → If the Troll fails by 10 or more, it takes double damage (crit effect).
Superiority Die & Maneuvers for Martial Classes#Superiority Die Overview#All martial classes (Fighter, Barbarian, Ranger, Paladin, etc.) gain 1 Superiority Die per short/long rest. Superiority Dice are used to fuel maneuvers, which allow martial characters to perform special combat techniques. Battle Masters gain extra Superiority Dice and more maneuvers. Superiority Die Scaling: Levels 1–9 → 1d6 Levels 10–16 → 1d8 Levels 17+ → 1d10 Martial Maneuver Progression#Level Maneuvers Known Unlocked Maneuvers 3 2 Basic Maneuvers 5 3 Advanced Maneuvers 7 4 Tactical Maneuvers 9 5 Expert Maneuvers 11 6 Legendary Maneuvers 13 7 Legendary Maneuvers 15 8 Mythic Maneuvers 17 9 Mythic Maneuvers 19 10 Mythic Maneuvers Maneuver List#Maneuver Name Type Effect Unlock Level Precision Strike Attack Add Superiority Die to attack roll 3 Parry Defense Reduce damage by Superiority Die + DEX 3 Riposte Reaction Attack after enemy misses you 3 Trip Attack Attack Knock target prone if they fail a STR save 3 Disarming Strike Attack Force enemy to drop weapon/item 5 Menacing Strike Attack Cause fear in a target 5 Brace Reaction Attack an enemy moving into range 5 Tactical Push Attack Push enemy 10 feet back 7 Quickstep Movement Move 10 feet as a reaction 7 Commanding Shout Tactical Give an ally an extra attack 9 Unbreakable Will Defense Gain advantage on all saves until next turn 9 Sweeping Strike Attack Hit two enemies with one attack 11 Overpowering Blow Attack Knock an enemy back 20 feet 11 Master Duelist Attack Reroll an attack once per short rest 13 Deathblow Attack If you hit a creature below 50% HP, they make a CON save or die 15 Legendary Endurance Defense Ignore exhaustion & resist all damage for 1 turn 17 Storm of Blades Attack Make 3 attacks using 1 action 19 How Maneuvers Work#At level 3, martial classes pick 2 maneuvers from the list. At levels 5, 7, 9, 11, etc., they unlock new maneuvers. Superiority Dice recover on a short/long rest. Battle Masters get extra Superiority Dice and can use more maneuvers per rest.
